title: Location, Community, Quality Living. It Starts Here!
posting_body: Available, beautiful spacious 2/2 with attached direct entry 2 car garage, with granite countertops, wood vinyl plank flooring, spacious closets, stainless steel appliances, nickel finishes, beautiful natural tone cabinets, 2 garden tubs, wood burning fireplace, with 2 balconies!
Experience upscale living that puts your comfort and convenience as the top priority.

Our unique community offers high end condo quality finishes and layouts with every apartment having spacious kitchens, abundant cabinet and storage space, large bedrooms, direct access two car garages.

Nestled in between the affluent Bent Tree and Willow Bend neighborhoods, the communities prime location offers access to incredible shopping, amazing restaurants, and exciting entertainment, all while living in a serene and peaceful setting.
● Resort Style Pool with lounge seating
● Park with Dog Run plus access to Preston Trail
do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
